cards.title: Blitz
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero deals a target 3 Fire damage.
Select a hero. Until the start of your next turn, whenever that hero uses a power, that player's hero deals a target 1 Fire damage.
One hero may use a power.

cards.title: Ruby
body: At the start of your turn, Blitz may deal a target 3 Fire damage. If damage is dealt this way, destroy this card.
powers: Shuffle a Conduit from your trash into your deck.

cards.title: Conflagration Rod
cards.body: When this card enters play, return any other Focuses in your play area to your hand.
cards.powers: Discard the top card of your deck. If it is a one-shot, you may put it into play. If no cards entered play this way, {Blitz} deals each non-hero target 1 Fire damage.

cards.title: Bonfire Circlet
cards.body: When this card enters play, return any other Focuses in your play area to your hand.
cards.powers: {Blitz} deals herself up to 3 Fire damage. {Blitz} deals a target X Fire damage, where X is the amount of Fire damage Blitz dealt herself this turn.

cards.title: Combustion Staff
cards.body: When this card enters play, return any other Focuses in your play area to your hand.
cards.powers: Increase damage dealt by Elementals in your play area by 1 until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Power Explosion
cards.body: The first time you use a power on a Focus each turn, {Blitz} may deal herself 2 Fire damage. If {Blitz} took damage this way, you may use a power now.
cards.powers: Discard two cards. Search your deck for a Focus and put it into play. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

cards.title: Wildfire
cards.body: {Blitz} either deals one target 4 Fire damage, or deals up to three targets 2 Fire damage each.

cards.title: Elemental Wrath
body: Select an elemental in your play area. X on this card equals that targets current HP.
That target deals another target X Fire damage.
If there are at least four Conduits in play, instead it deals each villain target X Fire damage.

cards.title: Controlled Burn
body: {Blitz} deals a target 3 Fire damage. If it was a non-character card and you have a Conduit in your play area, prevent any end of turn effects on that card until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Scorched Earth
body: If there are at least three Conduits in play, {Blitz} deals a villain target 4 Fire damage.

cards.title: Inferno Wisp
body: The first time each turn that {Blitz} deals a target 2 or more Fire damage at once, increase the next damage dealt by this card by 1.
At the end of your turn, this card deals a target 1 Fire damage.

cards.title: Everburning Phoenix
body: At the end of your turn, this card deals a target 2 Fire damage.
At the start of your turn, if this card has less than 5 HP, set its HP to 5.

cards.title: Blazing Bunny
body: At the end of your turn, you may put a Blazing Bunny from your hand into play.
At the start of your turn, this card deals a target X Fire damage, where X is the number of Blazing Bunnys in play. Then, shuffle this card into your deck.

promoCards.title: Blitz
powers: Search your deck for an Elemental and put it into play. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may discard their hand, then draw X cards, where X is the number of cards discarded this way plus 1.
One hero deals a target 3 Fire damage.
The environment deals each non-hero target 1 irreducible Fire damage.
